name: centerline
description: A bookmarklet you can use to get a centerline on any browser window, for design purposes.

scripts.scripts: jshint index.js && cp index.js dist/centerline.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/centerline.min.js dist/centerline.js && perl -i -MURI::Escape -ne 'print uri_escape($_)' dist/centerline.min.js
scripts.deployment: git add dist && npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -am "Autogenerated pre-deployment commit" && git reset HEAD~2 && git add . && git commit -am "Release $(cat package.json | jq -r .version)" && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
scripts.sync: git checkout gh-pages ; git merge master ; git push ; git checkout master
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deployment && npm run sync
